Posts.Content: Feb 11, 2017 01:54PM - edited Feb 11, 2017 05:33PM by Jink I too completed 4 rounds of AC followed by 12 rounds of Taxol (last Taxol treatment next Wednesday!). Has ANYONE had issues with getting swollen bumps appear on the rims of their lids? I am seeing tiny little black hairs appearing slowly and am thinking that the new growth is irritating the hair shafts. Can't seem to find anything anywhere on this. Woke up this morning to a swollen right lid and a tiny little white bump that appeared right on the rim of my upper lid.
